name: aPong
description:
Pong is a classic game. So re-live it with this new game, aPong. The a is there for special reasons... ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

You can play by youself against the computer if you have no friends, OR if you do have friends, you can play it with them!

Use the W and A keys to control the paddle on the left side of the screen, or the Up and Down arrow keys if you are on the right!
